name: Christmas Race 2
description:
Help Santa to pick up presents on the trail! The more gifts you collect, the higher your score! You can also buy new characters and sledge in the shop!
But Christmas Race 2 does not just talk about Christmas and Santa Claus, 5 new universes are unlockable by buying special characters!

Merry Christmas!



Features:

■ A very slippery slope!
■ Pretty decorations!
■ A shop with no less than 20 characters and 36 sleds!
■ 6 different worlds!
■ Infinite levels and completely random!
■ Nice ambient music!
■ Addictive gameplay!
■ Random gifts every hour!
